title: Introduction to Jinja
subtitle: Learn about the Jinja templating engine.
body: Jinja is a modern and designer-friendly templating language for Python, modelled after Django's templates. It is fast, widely used and secure with the optional sandboxed template execution environment. Features include template inheritance, automatic HTML escaping to prevent XSS attacks, sandboxed execution, and extensive filter support. Jinja templates are just text files that contain variables and/or expressions, which get replaced with values when a template is rendered.
author: Emily Mortimer
